# Professional Services Expert in Human Behavioral Sciences

## Tender Information

*   Solicitation Number: 202404006
*   Tender Reference Number: MX-443110166068
*   Amendment Number: 8
*   Tender Closing Date: 25 June 2024 at 14:00 Eastern Time
*   Contracting Entity: VIA Rail Canada Inc.
*   Address: 3 Place Ville-Marie, Suite 500 Montreal, QC H3B 2C9 Canada

## Procurement Details

VIA Rail Canada Inc. is seeking the services of a professional expert in human behavioral sciences. The selected vendor must be able to assess train operations and identify potential improvement opportunities in the following areas:

*   Risk identification and mitigation associated with human factors such as fatigue, multiple-tasking, high cognitive loads, complex environments, and unusual circumstances.
*   Crew resource management (CRM),
*   Occurrence investigation and self-reporting processes with regards to human factors,
*   Training and awareness strategy including content, plan, and effectiveness,
*   Safety management system and processes performance and effectiveness,
*   Safety culture.

## Mandatory Criteria

The vendor must meet the following criteria to be considered for this tender:

*   The team lead must be able to communicate in English or French.
*   The vendor must have a minimum of seven (7) years of experience in human behavioral science.
*   At least one team member assigned to VIA's mandate must have a minimum of seven (7) years of experience in human behavioral science.
*   All team members must be able to travel across Canada.
*   The vendor must be able to deliver the reports in English and French.
*   All team members must be able to start the services within seven (7) calendar days following the contract signature.

## Notice and Documents

You can submit a bid and access the documents on <https://www.merx.com>.   Fees may apply; See <https://www.merx.com/public/pricing> for more information. Please refer to the tender description or tender documents for additional information.
